query:

ADD COLUMN avatar TEXT AFTER email,
ADD COLUMN oauthProvider ENUM('manus', 'google') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'manus' AFTER loginMethod,
ADD COLUMN communityPreference VARCHAR(50) AFTER oauthProvider;
